languages.text: "Если Владайм идиот, то продолжит клянчить помощь у Вольного Торговца. Если нет — мы еще долго ничего от него не услышим".
languages.translation_comment:
Footfall was given over to Vladaym.
Idira: "So Vladaym has been left in charge of Footfall. Let's see what he will make of this mess with Chorda."

traits.locale_text: "Если Владайм идиот, то продолжит клянчить помощь у Вольного Торговца. Если нет — мы еще долго ничего от него не услышим".

languages.text: "If Vladaym is an idiot, he will continue begging the Rogue Trader for help. If not, it will be a while before we hear from him again."
languages.translation_comment:
Footfall was given over to Vladaym.
Idira: "So Vladaym has been left in charge of Footfall. Let's see what he will make of this mess with Chorda."
languages.original_text: "Если Владайм идиот, то продолжит клянчить помощь у Вольного Торговца. Если нет — мы еще долго ничего от него не услышим".

traits.locale_text: "If Vladaym is an idiot, he will continue begging the Rogue Trader for help. If not, it will be a while before we hear from him again."
"If Vladaym is an idiot, he will continue begging the Rogue Trader for help. If not, it will be a while before we hear from him again."

"If Vladaym is an idiot, he will continue begging the Rogue Trader for help. If not, it will be a while before we hear from him again."

languages.text: 「ヴラダイムが間抜けなら、これからもローグトレーダーに助けを乞い続けるだろう。そうでないなら、しばらくは奴の声を聞くこともないはずだ」
languages.original_text: "If Vladaym is an idiot, he will continue begging the Rogue Trader for help. If not, it will be a while before we hear from him again."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴラダイムが間抜けなら、これからもローグトレーダーに助けを乞い続けるだろう。そうでないなら、しばらくは奴の声を聞くこともないはずだ」

languages.text: "Wenn Vladaym ein Idiot ist, fleht er {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} weiter um Hilfe an. Wenn nicht, wird es eine Weile dauern, bis wir wieder von ihm hören."
languages.original_text: "If Vladaym is an idiot, he will continue begging the Rogue Trader for help. If not, it will be a while before we hear from him again."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Vladaym ein Idiot ist, fleht er {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} weiter um Hilfe an. Wenn nicht, wird es eine Weile dauern, bis wir wieder von ihm hören."

languages.text: « Si Vladaym est stupide, il continuera à supplier {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de l'aider. Autrement, nous n'entendrons plus parler de lui pendant longtemps. »
languages.original_text: "If Vladaym is an idiot, he will continue begging the Rogue Trader for help. If not, it will be a while before we hear from him again."

traits.locale_text: « Si Vladaym est stupide, il continuera à supplier {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de l'aider. Autrement, nous n'entendrons plus parler de lui pendant longtemps. »

languages.text: «Si Vladaym es idiota, seguirá pidiendo ayuda {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente. Si no lo es, tardaremos una temporada en volver a saber de él».
languages.original_text: "If Vladaym is an idiot, he will continue begging the Rogue Trader for help. If not, it will be a while before we hear from him again."

traits.locale_text: «Si Vladaym es idiota, seguirá pidiendo ayuda {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente. Si no lo es, tardaremos una temporada en volver a saber de él».

languages.text: “如果弗拉迪姆是个白痴的话，他会继续乞求行商浪人的帮助。如果他不是，那恐怕我们要过段日子才能再听到他的消息。”
languages.original_text: "If Vladaym is an idiot, he will continue begging the Rogue Trader for help. If not, it will be a while before we hear from him again."

traits.locale_text: “如果弗拉迪姆是个白痴的话，他会继续乞求行商浪人的帮助。如果他不是，那恐怕我们要过段日子才能再听到他的消息。”

languages.text: "Vladaym gerçekten aptalsa Hür Tacir'den yardım dilenmeye devam eder. Değilse ondan bir süre daha ses çıkmaz."
languages.original_text: "If Vladaym is an idiot, he will continue begging the Rogue Trader for help. If not, it will be a while before we hear from him again."

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym gerçekten aptalsa Hür Tacir'den yardım dilenmeye devam eder. Değilse ondan bir süre daha ses çıkmaz."
